sections.text: Notice of controlled dangerous substance conviction; licensing authorityWhen a person is convicted of violating any felony provision of the Uniform Controlled Dangerous Substances Law, the court imposing sentence shall determine if the defendant possesses a license to practice a trade, occupation, or profession in this state and, if so, the court shall cause notice of the conviction to be forwarded to the appropriate licensing authority.Acts 1989, No. 81, ยง1.
